text: puokke nung suor anak( ampi ka la lah) . chaur anak pol tha a l laoh kuchea anak katsechakdei knong rueng ka la lah nih . brasenbae borsa del ban slab daoy kmean bansaoltouk kaun te mean bng ryy baaunosrei ku samreab neang trauv ttuol peakkandal nei keromorotk . haey borsa noh nung trauv ttuol morotk teangoasa pi neang vinh brasenbae neang kmean kaun . tebae borsa del slab noh mean bng ryy baaunosrei pir neak vinh ku samreab neang teangpir neak nung ttuol ban pir pheak bei nei keromorotk noh . haey brasenbae borsa del slab noh mean bangobaaun brosa ning bangobaaun srei chraen neak ku samreab borsa mneak ttuol ban pir chamnek nei sdrei mneak . a l laoh banhcheak yeang chbasa samreab puok anak daembi komaoy puok anak v nge v ng . haey a l laoh doeng nouv avei teangoasa
